snippet: Stephanie VanBuren, who was laid off two years ago, is going to school to be a stenographer and cares for her daughter, Atia, who has a sensory disorder.
abstract: Brooklyn Community Services secures funds for Stephanie VanBuren of Bedford-Stuyvesant to help cover costs of transportation to school and to family counseling sessions that are improving her parenting skills.
lead_paragraph: Stephanie VanBuren, who was laid off two years ago, is going to school to be a stenographer and cares for her daughter, Atia, who has a sensory disorder.

headline.print_headline: Mother Learns a New Skill And How to Calm Her Child
headline.seo: Mother Learns a New Trade and How to Soothe Her Child
headline.main: Mother Learns a New Skill and How to Calm Her Child
